lead_paragraph: Incoming White House press secretary Sean Spicer says he expects President-elect Donald Trump will boldly use Twitter to make major policy announcements.
snippet: Incoming White House press secretary Sean Spicer says he expects President-elect Donald Trump will boldly use Twitter to make major policy announcements....

headline.main: Trump Expected to Embrace Bold Use of Twitter
headline.print_headline: Trump Expected to Embrace Bold Use of Twitter
